answers.text: You can use CloudFormation to completely replace the old environment that may be compromised.
CloudFormation cannot really help you at all.
CloudFormation can be used to create a new, trusted environment in which to conduct a deeper investigation.
CloudFormation can automatically create replicas of the existing system with copies of data.

text: Your company suspects that their AWS infrastructure has been compromised. You have been asked to investigate and conduct a root cause analysis. How can CloudFormation assist you in determining the cause of the incident?
